title: Are Ranked Queues Closing After the Season Ends?
body: I was under the impression that ranked queues would stay open after the end of season but just wouldn't have any effect on your rank/MMR, however I read a post which said that queues were closing. Is there any official answer anywhere? I'm really not keen on being forced into normal games until Preseason.

replies.body:
2015 ranked season is ending!
BY RIOT SOCRATES
Only days remain until the end of the 2015 season. There’s still time to reach your ranked goals. If you can push your way to Gold or higher, you’ll earn the exclusive Victorious Sivir champion skin.
At midnight AEDT (2AM NZDT), **ranked queues will come down for about twelve hours and we'll start doling out rewards**.
Find out more about the 2015 season rewards here!

Source: http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/riot-games/announcements/2015-ranked-season-ending
